## Overview

The templated bindable-value object, [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/BindableValue] `<T>`, determines that the value you choose for type `T` adopts this protocol. # BindableData

**Protocol**

An opaque base protocol for bindable data objects.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol BindableData
```

## Overview

The templated bindable-value object, [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/BindableValue] `<T>`, determines that the value you choose for type `T` adopts this protocol. The types that the framework accepts are: [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/Transform], [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/Float], [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/Double], [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/SIMD2], [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/SIMD3], [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/SIMD4], [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/simd/simd_quatf], [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/Bool], [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/Int], and [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/String].

## Compliance-related protocols

- **AnimatableData**: A functionality specification that animatable data types adopt.

## Conforming Types

- Transform
